title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Outline the scope of the project, key features, and functional requirements for the RealTimeAnalyticsEngine.

title: Design Architecture for RealTimeAnalyticsEngine
description: Create a high-level design and architecture plan for the RealTimeAnalyticsEngine.

title: Develop Frontend Interface for RealTimeAnalyticsEngine
description: Design and implement the user interface (dashboard, charts, filters) for visualizing data in real-time.

title: Implement Backend Services for Data Processing
description: Create the backend services responsible for data collection, processing, and aggregation.

title: Develop Real-time Data Streaming Mechanism
description: Create a real-time data streaming mechanism to handle thousands of data sources.
dependencies: Implement Backend Services for Data Processing

title: Set Up and Configure RealTimeAnalyticsEngine Database
description: Design, setup, and configure the database schema for the RealTimeAnalyticsEngine.

title: Implement CI/CD Pipeline for RealTimeAnalyticsEngine
description: Create a continuous integration and deployment pipeline to streamline development, testing, and deployment processes.
dependencies: Implement Backend Services for Data Processing

title: Perform Unit Testing and Quality Assurance for RealTimeAnalyticsEngine
description: Carry out unit testing, integration testing, and quality assurance processes to ensure the system is functioning as expected.

title: Implement Security Measures for RealTimeAnalyticsEngine
description: Secure the RealTimeAnalyticsEngine by implementing necessary security measures, such as authentication, authorization, and encryption.

title: Document RealTimeAnalyticsEngine Functionality and Usage
description: Create documentation that explains the functionality, usage, and setup of the RealTimeAnalyticsEngine.
